sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma voiture a besoin d'être réparée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My car needs to be repaired.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì de xìngzhì hěn yánzhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nature de cette affaire est très grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The nature of this matter is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这门课一共有三十个学时。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè mén kè yīgòng yǒu sānshí gè xuéshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce cours compte trente heures au total.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This course has a total of thirty class hours.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est blessé à la poitrine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He injured his chest.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait des recherches académiques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is conducting academic research.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Te voilà !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You're here!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il cherche des opportunités d'emploi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is looking for job opportunities.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议时间延长了一个小时。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì shíjiān yánchéng le yī gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La durée de la réunion a été prolongée d'une heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting was extended by one hour.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a accompli la tâche rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He completed the task quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses dents sont très blanches.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His teeth are very white.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào mǎi yī bǎ xīn yáshuā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'acheter une nouvelle brosse à dents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to buy a new toothbrush.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 老师对学生要求很严格。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī duì xuésheng yāoqiú hěn yángé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur est très strict avec les étudiants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher is very strict with students.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这种传统延续了很多年。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng chuántǒng yánxù le hěn duō nián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette tradition perdure depuis de nombreuses années.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This tradition has continued for many years.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon père est très sévère avec nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Father is very strict with us.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut développer de bonnes habitudes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should develop good habits.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il porte une paire de lunettes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is wearing a pair of glasses.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài yángtái shàng shài tàiyáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le soleil sur le balcon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am sunbathing on the balcony.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez payer en yuan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay in RMB.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai un peu mal au dos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My waist hurts a little.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēng bǎ shù yáo de hěn lìhai.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le vent fait beaucoup bouger les arbres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wind shakes the trees violently.
